title: Wanting
description: She saw herself in the missing little girl, and Special Agent Carrie Sparks would do whatever she had to do to find that child. Even pair up with Unit Chief Sebastian Lorcan.Lorcan always watched her, judging every move she made. And Carrie knew she always came up short with him. Still...there was a little girl out there who needed them both...Sebastian Lorcan was fascinated by Carrie Sparks and had been since his transfer to the PAVAD division two months earlier. And when his friend's daughter runs away, Carrie is his first choice for help in finding that little girl.But it soon became apparent someone else is searching for Carrie...someone with an agenda far from good...Adult-content rating: This book contains content considered unsuitable for young readers 17 and under, and which may be offensive to some readers of all ages.@ 83,899 words443 KB
author: Calle J. Brookes
